title: Why did pirates wear earings? - Quora

response.answer_text: Gold Earrings were high value and could pay for a pirates funeral, Pirates also took fashion from various places around which included colourful clothing and jewellery. Earrings were also worn for superstitious reasons. Some pirates were convinced that wearing an earring would improve or even cure bad eyesight, as they believed that the precious metals in an earring possessed magical healing powers. Another tale was that pierced ears would prevent seasickness.

It was basically their money for when they died that would Ben used for a burial or to be sent back to their birthplace to be buried or to be sent to where they wanted to Be buried. It was just a way for them to pay for final rights.
